data.scheme_name: Karnataka IT Policy 2020 - 2025 - Information Technology Hubs/ Clusters - IT/ITeS entity - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provide capital subsidy of 20 % of Fixed Investment for Infrastructure (FII) excluding cost of land upto Rs.300 lakhs, whichever is lower.
data.eligibility: IT/ITeS entities having a registered office in Karnataka under the Companies Act (1956/2013), Partnership Act (1932), LLP Act (2008), or the Karnataka Shops & Commercial Establishment Act (1961).
data.conditions:
Entities must be registered with KITS/Department.
Minimum employment generation of 500 by units in the IT/ITeS industry at IT Hubs/Clusters set up in Zones 1 and 2 during the policy period.
data.beneficiaries: IT/ITeS entities having a registered office in Karnataka under the Companies Act (1956/2013), Partnership Act (1932), LLP Act (2008), or the Karnataka Shops & Commercial Establishment Act (1961).
data.prerequisites: Minimum employment generation of 500 by units in the IT/ITeS industry at IT Hubs/Clusters set up in Zones 1 and 2 during the policy period.
data.context: • Government of Karnataka (GoK) has formulated Karnataka's IT Policy for the period 2020 - 2025 with a focus on the continued development of infrastructure, markets, ecosystem, talent and ease of doing business to support the growth of the IT industry.
data.objective: • The main objective is to promote and support Digital (IT, ESDM, Innovation and Allied) Industry growth and Investments in Karnataka. To provide handholding services and assist in preparation of Technology - sector specific investment reports for respective stakeholders. To act like bridge between Industry and the Government for promoting the technology Industry in Karnataka and to build the brand equity of the State and enhance its leadership position across all key segments.
data.description: • Scheme provides capital subsidy of 20% of Fixed Infrastructure Investment (FII) Maximum upto Rs.300 lakhs.
data.how_to_apply:
Applicant can register from below site
http://ktech.amareatechsolutions.com/login
data.funding_mechanism: Fund/Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority after fulfilment of condition.
data.additional_info: • The talukas in Karnataka are classified into zones to ensure a strong industrial base with equitable allocation of funds. The State is classified into three Zones namely Zone 1, Zone 2 and Zone 3 as per the prevailing Karnataka Industrial Policy. Zone 1 : Holalkere, Channagiri, Jagalur, Honnali, Gudibande, Bagepalli, Chikkaballapura, Srinivasapura, Soraba, Hosanagara, Shikaripura, Madhugiri, Koratagere, Gubbi, Pavagada, Chikkanayakanahalli, Yelandur, Gundlupet, Hanur, Chamarajanagar, Kollegal, Arakalgud, Belur, Arasikere, Madikeri, Somwarpet, Virajpet, Ponnampete, Kushalnagar, Bilagi, Badami, Mudhol, Jamkhandi, Hunagund, Guledgudda, Rabakavi - Banahatti, Terdal, Ilkal, Bagalkote, Bailhongal, Soundathi, Chikkodi, Raibag, Khanapur, Ramdurg, Hukkeri, Athani, Gokak, Nippani, Kagavadi, Mudalgi, Yaragatti, Kittur, Belagavi, Sindgi, Indi, Muddebihal, B Bagewadi, Alamela, Babaleshwar, Nidagundi, Tikota, Chedachana, Kolhar, Devarahipparagi, Talikote, Vijayapura, Navalgund, Kalghatagi, Kundaghol, Annigeri, Alnavar, Hubballi (R), Dharwada, Hubballi(U), Mundargi, Nargund, Ron, Shrirahatti, Gajaendragad, Lakshmeshwar, Gadag, Savanur, Shiggaon, Hirekurur, Hanagal, Ranebennur, Byadagi, Rattihalli, Haveri, Honnavar, Sirsi, Mundagod, Yellapura, Siddapura, Haliyal, Joida, Bhatkal, Ankola, Kumta, Dandeli, Karwar, H B Halli, Hadagalli, Kudligi, Hosepet, Sandur, Siraguppa, Harappana Halli, Kurogod, Kottur, Kampli, Bellary, Bhalki, Humnabad, Basava Kalyana, Aurad, Chitaguppa, Hulusur, Kamala Nagar, Bidar, Afzalpur, Aland, Jewargi, Sedam, Chittapur, Chincholi, Kalagi, Kamalapur, Yedrami, Shahabad, Kalaburagi, Yadgir, Shahapur, Shorapur, Hunasagi, Vadagera, Gurumitkal, Kushtagi, Yelburga, Gangavathi, Kukkunur, Karatagi, Kanakagiri, Koppal, Sindhanur, Manvi, Lingasugur, Devadurga, Maski, Siravara, Raichur Zone 2 : Magadi, Ramanagara, Channapatna, Kanakapura, Harohalli, Hiriyur, Chitradurga, Challakere, Hosadurga, Molkalmuru, Davanagere, Harihar, Nyamati, Chintamani, Gowribidanur, Siddlaghatta, Cheluru, Bangarpet, KGF, Kolar, Malur, Mulbagal, Sagar, Thirthahalli, Shivamogga, Bhadravathi, Turuvekere, Sira, Tiptur, Kunigal, Tumakur, Kadur, Mudigere, Tarikere, Chickamagalur, Ajjampur, Shringeri, Koppa, NR Pura, Kalasa, Bantwal, Sulya, Belthangadi, Puttur, Mulki, Ullal, Moodbidri, Kadaba, Mangalore, Alur, C R Patna, Shantigrama, Hassan, H N Pura, Saklespura, Srirangapatna, Pandavapura, Mandya, Maddur, Nagamangala, Malavalli, K R Pet, Hunsur, K R Nagara, Mysuru, Nanjangud, T N Pura, Periyapatna, HD Kote, Saraguru, Saligrama, Karkala, Bhramhavara, Udupi, Kundapura, Kapu, Hebri, Baindur. Zone 3 : Anekal, Bengaluru(N), Bengaluru(S), Yelahanka, Bengaluru(E), Devanahalli, Doddaballapura, Hoskote, Nelamangala. Fees structure for registration/provisional registration certificate with KITS/Department and this is non - refundable : IT/ITeS Entities = Rs. 10, 000/ - + (18% GST) Infrastructure Developer = Rs. 10, 000/ - + (18% GST) One - time application processing fee for availing benefits under Karnataka IT Policy 2020 - 25 : IT Hubs/Clusters, Co - working Spaces/Plug and Play Infrastructure = Rs. 20, 000/ - + (18% GST) Lease/Rental Reimbursement, Exemption on Stamp Duty, Power Tariff Concession, Quality Certification Cost Reimbursement, Marketing Cost Reimbursement, Reimbursements of PF/ESI, Patents Cost Reimbursement & R&D Support = Rs. 10, 000/ - + (18% GST)
data.checklist_info_a:
i. A self-declaration, as per the Milestone eligibility criteria requirements achieved in Phase II and in total (together in Phase I & II), with the following details.
- Name of the IT/ITeS Entities occupying the Co-working space/plug and play infrastructure.
- Lease / Rent duration by each IT/ITeS entity.
- Seat Occupancy details for each IT/ITeS Entities occupying the Co-working space/plug and play infrastructure.
ii. Copies of rental agreement documents with each the IT/ITeS entities occupying the Co-Working Space/Plug And Play Infrastructure.
iii. C.A certified Receipts and Payment account along with annexures for detailed receipts and payments for this phase and cumulative.
v. Self-attested Copies of all expenditure bills relevant in this Phase.
data.checklist_info_b:
Applicant can register from below site
IT BT (amareatechsolutions.com)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Room No. 602, 6th Floor, MS Building Bengaluru - 1
E-Mail ID : itbtsec@karnataka.gov.in
Phone No : 080-22280562
